    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public void setup()
           throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                  KeyNotFound
        Takes the port from configuration and setups the server. Throws error if the port value couldn't be read or if it is not an int.
        Throws:
        KeyNotFound - when value for port was not supplied in configuration.
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if value in configuration is not integer.
